title: PUBG unit sales worldwide 2018
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Unit sales in millions for 5 number of Months.
The Unit sales in millions is appeared to be the highest at Month June 2018 and lowest at Month May 2017.
There is a difference of 48.0 between the maximum Month June 2018 and minimum Month May 2017.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Unit sales in millions in the y axis.
The maximum Unit sales in millions 50.0 is found at Month June 2018 and the minimum is found at May 2017 where Month is 2.0.
Month September 2017 has the second highest value for Unit sales in millions.
The highest value at Month June 2018 is 25.0x times more than the lowest value at May 2017.
The Month June 2018 has the highest Unit sales in millions, followed by September 2017, and August 2017. Down to the Month May 2017 which is the lowest.
Overall Unit sales in millions has decreased over the Months.
The Month May 2017 tends to be 3.38 percent lower than average.
